unnormalised: Dude, seriously, change your password! My cousin Ravi's Facebook got hacked last week. Some scammer was trying to sell iPhones for like, Rs. 1000! He hadn't updated his password since '09. Also, enable 2FA, okay? It's not that hard and will save you a major headache. Use a password manager too, keep those passwords strong and unique! Seriously, donâ€™t be like Ravi.
normalised: Dude, seriously, change your password! My cousin Ravi's Facebook got hacked last week. Some scammer was trying to sell iPhones for like, rupee one thousand! He hadn't updated his password since two thousand and nine. Also, enable two factor authentication, okay? It's not that hard and will save you a major headache. Use a password manager too, keep those passwords strong and unique! Seriously, don't be like Ravi.
